meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6881.

td.p: Ben-Hur Flores, a customer service representative from Tampa, Florida
Virginia Hatfield, an opera singer from Toronto, Ontario, Canada
Jen Fiero, a librarian from Jackson, Michigan (whose 2-day cash winnings total $36,000)

tr.td: THE BIBLE TELLS ME SO
MOVIE MUSICALS
ALPHANUMERICS
THE LANGUAGE OF BEER
(Alex: You give me the language, please.)
IT'S A BIRD
THE MONUMENTS WOMEN
